publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4361 Fiona Hyslop: Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006—That the Parliament congratulates Linlithgow Reed Band on its Golden Jubilee; notes that it made its first public appearance at the installation of a deacon on 26 May 1956 and that it will be performing with the UNISON Kinneil Band on 27 May 2006 to mark the commemoration and in recognition of their shared heritage with the Kinneil Colliery Military Band, and recognises the valued contribution that bands such as Linlithgow Reed Band make to the civic life of their community as well as the world of music.
S2M-4361 Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4361 Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) Stewart Stevenson*

S2M-4361 Fiona Hyslop: Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006—That the Parliament congratulates Linlithgow Reed Band on its Golden Jubilee; notes that it made its first public appearance at the installation of a deacon on 26 May 1956 and that it will be performing with the UNISON Kinneil Band on 27 May 2006 to mark the commemoration and in recognition of their shared heritage with the Kinneil Colliery Military Band, and recognises the valued contribution that bands such as Linlithgow Reed Band make to the civic life of their community as well as the world of music. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Stewart Stevenson
S2M-4361 Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4361 Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4361 Golden Jubilee of Linlithgow Reed Band, 1956 to 2006 (lodged on 8 May 2006) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
